trans-unit.source: Provides control capability to validate that another control's value matches a provided regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于验证另一个控件的值是否与提供的正则表达式匹配的控件功能。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: This class behaves identically to the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 此类行为相同，对 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controls on a form raise validator controls on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>窗体上的控件引发窗体以在窗体提交到服务器时执行验证的验证程序控件。

trans-unit.source: To disable automatic validation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用自动验证，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how you can add regular expression properties, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator.ValidationExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> properties, programmatically during a page load.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何可以添加正则表达式的属性，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator.ValidationExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>属性，以编程方式在页面加载。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />；权限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Virtual method for derived class to create its own aggregated Web validator.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类为创建自己的聚合 Web 验证程序所使用的虚拟方法。

trans-unit.source: The Web validator is for getting and setting of the common properties of Web base validator.
trans-unit.target: 该 Web 验证程序用于获取和设置 Web 基本验证程序的常见属性。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: An aggregated Web validator.
trans-unit.target: 聚合 Web 验证程序。

trans-unit.source: Called during the validation stage when ASP.NET processes a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当 ASP.NET 处理 Web 页面时在验证阶段调用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the validator is valid, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果验证程序有效，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the regular expression assigned to be the validation criteria.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置被指定为验证条件的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression assigned to be the validation criteria.
trans-unit.target: 被指定为验证条件的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> does not perform validation on an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> 不对空字符串执行验证。

trans-unit.source: To test for an empty string, use the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> controls together.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试空字符串，请同时使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows some sample validation expressions:
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了一些示例验证表达式：

trans-unit.source: Type of Validation
trans-unit.target: 验证类型

trans-unit.source: Validation Expression
trans-unit.target: 验证表达式

trans-unit.source: Email
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件

trans-unit.source: Phone number
trans-unit.target: 电话号码

trans-unit.source: URL
trans-unit.target: URL

trans-unit.source: The regular expression assigned was malformed.
trans-unit.target: 所分配的正则表达式格式不正确。
